analysis.key_quote: Civil society in the US has been one of our cornerstones of our nation's wellbeing and this change will put a massive amount of our much needed civil servants on both sides of the aisle in harms way.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed regulations, highlighting concerns about the impact on civil servants and the integrity of civil society, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
